data.name: EF-12 Fighting game maker Demo
data.detailed_description:
Trial version of EF-12: Fighting game maker.

What's limited from the release version:
  • Only arcade mode with 2 characters are available.
  • Editing feature is limited (editable assets are removed)

Please use this to check if this application works properly in your system environment.

Full version will have more characters, versus mode and development mode, etc..



EF-12 is a playable 3D fighting game right from the moment you install it. Developed by Quad Arrow and designed by industry veteran Masahiro Onoguchi, EF-12 is the ultimate convergence of 3D fighting and game modification.

Built on a rock solid animation engine by one of the industry's best fighting game model animators, EF-12 is the perfect canvas to build your dream game, or the perfect fighting game tournament.

data.short_description: Trial version of EF-12: Fighting game maker. Only arcade mode with 2 characters are available.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: must
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7 or higher
  • Processor: Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX560
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: must
